rooms.description: spacious entrance hall with storage and cloakroom.
large living room oriented towards east for ample natural light and ventilation, features an open-plan design integrating modern furniture.
modern kitchen with integrated dining space, designed with energy-efficient appliances and adequate ventilation, positioned adjacent to the living room.
dining area adjoining the kitchen, designed for family gatherings.
spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet; window placement optimized following Vastu.
guest bedroom located towards the north for good air circulation.
secondary bedroom designed with natural lighting.
additional bedroom, optimally placed to maximize natural ventilation.
communal bathroom for the other bedrooms.
dedicated home theater room with soundproofing and ambient lighting, located in a quiet corner of the ground floor.
cozy library featuring built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and abundant natural light from strategically placed windows.
study room with a dedicated workspace, oriented to receive morning sunlight.
